column6:
Iron Man's one-woman Initiative team for Alaska finds herself in WAY over her head. Patsy Walker, Hellcat, is thrust into a world of magic, witches, rally-cars and demons of all shapes and sizes, and all she thought she was going to do was rough up a few lumber-thieves. Do not miss this mini-series, by soon-to-be stars KATHRYN IMMONEN (MARVEL COMICS PRESENTS) and DAVID LAFUENTE that will be talked about for years to come.,2008,8
Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:David Lafuente Garcia | penciller:Stuart Immonen | writer:Kathryn Immonen | letterer:Dave Lanphear | colorist:John Rauch
